scripts.deploy:mainnet-hosted: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service --ac --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ArtBlocks/art-blocks
scripts.deploy:mainnet-with-secondary-hosted: yarn prepare:mainnet-with-secondary && graph deploy --product hosted-service --ac --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ArtBlocks/art-blocks-with-secondary
scripts.deploy-ropsten-dev-hosted: yarn prepare:ropsten-dev && graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ArtBlocks/art-blocks-dev
scripts.deploy-ropsten-staging-hosted: yarn prepare:ropsten-staging && graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ArtBlocks/art-blocks-artist-staging
